hooks.command: INPUT=$(cat) && SID=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.session_id // "unknown"') && MSG=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.prompt // ""' | head -c 200 | sed 's/"/\\"/g') && mkdir -p .claude/logs && echo '{"timestamp":"'$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.000Z)'","cwd":"'$PWD'","tool":"UserPrompt","command":"'"$MSG"'","status":"success"}' >> .claude/logs/$SID.jsonl
